title: Looking forward to making Sri Lanka strong again – President congratulates new PM
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has wished the newly-appointed Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe the best, and states that he looks forward to working together to making Sri Lanka strong again.
Looking forward to making Sri Lanka strong again – President congratulates new PM
Court postpones police request to remove obstacles in Galle Face, to June 2022
